bundle.page.title: Knowledge Base Management
bundle.page.kbm.desc: You oversee the Knowledge Base, curating its contents by uploading fresh data—be it PDFs or Q&A—refining existing entries, and purging what no longer serves its purpose. It’s a quiet, meticulous task—maintaining order in a space that few notice, until they need it.
bundle.page.view.pdf.title: View Uploaded PDFs
bundle.page.view.pdf.desc: Below are listed uploaded PDF files to the knowledge database. You can upload more or delete existing ones.
bundle.page.view.pdf.multilingual.enabled.tip: This document was translated into the supported languages.
bundle.page.view.pdf.multilingual.disabled.tip: This document is stored only in the original language.
bundle.page.pdf.validation.required: Select at least one PDF file.
bundle.page.view.pdf.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this PDF?
bundle.page.view.qa.title: Manage Question-Answer Pairs
bundle.page.view.qa.desc: Below are listed uploaded Question-Answers to the knowledge database. You can upload, modify or delete existing ones.
bundle.page.view.qa.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this question-answer pair?
bundle.page.view.qa.ts.tip: The "Translate Status" specifies whether a given question-answer pair was uploaded in its original language or translated by the server from the original version.
bundle.page.view.qa.modal.tips: For  guidance on forming questions and answers see
bundle.page.view.qa.model.q.example: Ex: How do I reset my password?
bundle.page.view.qa.model.a.example: Ex: Click "Forgot Password" on the login page and follow the instructions in your email.
bundle.page.view.qa.modal.q.validation.size: Question must be at most 100 characters.
bundle.page.view.qa.modal.a.validation.size: Answer must be at most 1000 characters.
bundle.notification.success.upload: The data has been uploaded successfully. It will be processed shortly, and you will receive a message once the processing is complete.
bundle.footer.title: © 2025 Ivan Krylosov | TR Chatbot | AI-Powered Chat Assistant
